Articles.Content: There are some large SSTO's around which are large, laggy, and cool. Let's put them all in one place!
You know, there's already a thread for all kinds of SSTO's..
For the love of Kod, yet another compilation thread... let's clutter the spacecraft exchange a bit more!

For the love of Kod, yet another compilation thread... let's clutter the spacecraft exchange a bit more!

What would happen if everyone who posted on these compilation threads made a new post for. Each. And. Every. Single. One.

But yeah, one already exists.

What would happen if everyone who posted on these compilation threads made a new post for. Each. And. Every. Single. One.

But yeah, one already exists.

A lot of people already do that. They post up pics of their creation in the "master" SSTO thread, then turn around and make their own individual post for it with more details and a download link.

EDIT:

It's the SSTO showcase thread (should be stickie'd, in my opinion)

Edited July 25, 2013 by Deadweasel

What would happen if everyone who posted on these compilation threads made a new post for. Each. And. Every. Single. One.

But yeah, one already exists.

You could find the individual craft threads (I usually google their names +KSP forum) with full explanations and lots of pics after glancing at a handful of master threads that you don't have to hunt eight pages to find, because they are used at lest several times per day. That is, if you are interested.

Rune. YMMV, but that's my opinion.
